message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
